name: Briefer
headline: The collaborative data platform.
description:
Briefer helps data scientists and analysts build interactive visualizations and data apps using a Notion-like interface.

Connect to your data sources, write SQL or Python, collaborate through comments and multiplayer editing, and run code in whichever compute environments you need.

founders.name: Lucas da Costa, Founder
founders.description:
I'm the founder and CEO at Briefer. Previously, I worked as a senior software engineer at Elastic and led software engineering teams at an early-stage startup in London.

I used to maintain large OSS projects like Chai.js and Sinon.js and contributed to many others, including Jest.

As an author, I wrote "Testing JavaScript Applications," published by Manning. I've also spoken in more than ten countries, and my content has been voluntarily translated into more than seven languages.

founders.name: Lucas Vieira, Founder
founders.description: Lucas, is a software engineer and open-source enthusiast with a decade of experience, actively contributes to numerous open source projects. He used to maintain Chai.js, a popular JavaScript testing framework with 7.8k+ GitHub stars. As the former Head of Technology at Joga, he built a product from scratch, used by thousands in dozens of countries. Now, Lucas is the CTO of Ergomake, developing a product for developers to deploy preview environments for any stack.

raw_markdown="Briefer
[**Briefer is now open-source** Star us on GitHub ](https://briefer.cloud/<https:/github.com/briefercloud/briefer>)
Dismiss
![background pattern](https://briefer.cloud/zebra-pattern.svg)
[briefer](https://briefer.cloud/</>)
Open main menu
[Community](https://briefer.cloud/<https:/join.slack.com/t/briefercommunity/shared_invite/zt-2surl2chh-6eNkQRbj5F0d2juiUKTBuQ>)[Docs](https://briefer.cloud/<https:/docs.briefer.cloud>)[Blog](https://briefer.cloud/</blog>)[Pricing](https://briefer.cloud/</pricing>)
[Get started](https://briefer.cloud/<https:/app.briefer.cloud/auth/signup>)
[![](https://briefer.cloud/yc-logo.png)Briefer is backed by Y Combinator](https://briefer.cloud/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/briefer>)
# Open-source dashboards and notebooks for teams that move fast
Briefer helps everyone get the information they need in seconds, either manually or using an AI assistant.
[Get started](https://briefer.cloud/<https:/app.briefer.cloud/auth/signup>)[Talk to us →](https://briefer.cloud/<https:/calendly.com/lucasfcosta/briefer-intro-call>)
[See a demo!](https://briefer.cloud/<https:/www.loom.com/share/40c97d06985c46858938f42f48916e68>)
## Used by thousands of engineers and data scientists, including teams at
![Incognia](https://briefer.cloud/incognia-logo.png)![Whop](https://briefer.cloud/whop_logo_cloud.svg)![Wander](https://briefer.cloud/wander-logo.png)![Abstra](https://briefer.cloud/abstra_logo_cloud.svg)![Skyvern](https://briefer.cloud/skyvern_logo_cloud.png)
## How it works
Connect, query, manipulate, and share.
Connect your data sources, query them with SQL, and manipulate results with Python.
Then, use query results to create presentable notebooks, dashboards, or data apps.
Connect your data source
    
Connect Briefer to data sources like Postgres, BigQuery, Redshift, or MySQL.
Run queries
    
Run SQL queries straight from your Briefer documents.
Execute Python
    
Run Python code using your query results as dataframes.
Share your results
    
Use your notebook's components to publish reports, dashboards, or data apps.
![background pattern](https://briefer.cloud/zebra-pattern.svg)
## SQL support
Secure queries with zero boilerplate
You can write SQL directly in Briefer. We'll automatically turn your query's results into dataframes that you can use in Python blocks.
![](https://briefer.cloud/bigquery.png)BigQuery
![](https://briefer.cloud/postgres.png)PostgreSQL
![](https://briefer.cloud/athena.png)Athena
![](https://briefer.cloud/redshift.png)Redshift
![](https://briefer.cloud/mysql.png)MySql
![](https://briefer.cloud/csv.png)CSV Imports
![Product screenshot](https://briefer.cloud/queries-screenshot.png)
## Python support
Python code blocks with an AI assistant
Briefer comes with hundreds of pre-installed libraries and a built-in AI assistant that helps you write code faster.
Use AI to write code and fix errors.
    Instead of writing code, just describe what you want to do. If you make a mistake, the AI will fix it for you.
Use query results as dataframes.
    Briefer automatically converts query results into dataframes that you can use in Python blocks.
Schedule executions.
    Schedule your Python blocks to run on a recurring schedule. Ideal for writebacks or training and monitoring ML models.
Show what matters.
    Hide all the data wrangling and show only the results that matter.
![Product screenshot](https://briefer.cloud/python-screenshot.png)
![background pattern](https://briefer.cloud/zebra-pattern.svg)
## Turn notebooks into Python-powered dashboards
No more screenshots. Just dashboards.
Forget taking screenshots, pasting them somewhere else, and having data go stale. In Briefer you can turn your notebooks into dashboards and data apps.
Dashboard-mode or report-mode.
    Choose between publishing your notebook as a dashboard or a traditional report.
Hide irrelevant code.
    Add multiple blocks to fetch, transform, and plot data. Then, choose which blocks to publish and which to hide.
Add filters and inputs.
    Use dropdowns, text fields, and date inputs to create interactive dashboards and apps.
Email and slack notifications.
    Schedule your notebooks to run and send a PDF report to your email or Slack.
Generate snapshots.
    We'll take a snapshot of your notebook every time it runs. That way, you can see how your data evolved over time.
Create public links.
    Create a public link to share your reports and dashboards with anyone, like a client or a colleague.
## Build data apps
Use inputs, dropdowns, sliders, and date selectors to create interactive pages that your team can use to explore data and make decisions.
  * Model prototyping
  * Customer segmentation
  * Churn prediction
  * Demand forecasting
  * Retention analysis
  * Revenue attribution


[Get started →](https://briefer.cloud/<https:/app.briefer.cloud/auth/signup>)
![background pattern](https://briefer.cloud/zebra-pattern.svg)
## Collaborate with your team in real-time
Briefer gets your team on the same page (literally).
Multiplayer editing
    See who's editing which part of the document and collaborate in real time.
Comments
    Add comments, raise issues, and tag your teammates in any part of the document.
Presentation mode
    Hide code from non-technical stakeholders and present your findings in a clean, easy-to-read format.
Granular permissions
    Control who can view or edit which workspace, and the data sources in each.
## Footer

generated_description:
**Briefer: The Collaborative Data Platform**

Founded in 2022 and hailing from São Paulo, Brazil, Briefer is shaping the future of data collaboration. It’s backed by Y Combinator’s Batch S23, which speaks volumes about its potential. With a compact yet effective team of just two, they're on a mission to empower data scientists and analysts through a user-friendly platform that combines the power of interactive visualizations and data apps.

**What Does Briefer Do?**

Imagine a Notion-like interface where you can connect your data sources, write SQL or Python, and collaborate in real time. That's Briefer in a nutshell.

- **Integration:** Briefer lets you connect to various data sources—think Postgres, BigQuery, Redshift, and MySQL. 
- **Data Querying:** You can run SQL queries directly from your documents and manipulate results with Python.
- **Collaborative Features:** Commenting and multiplayer editing mean that your team stays on the same page. You can tag teammates, discuss findings, and present results in an accessible manner.
- **Flexible Output:** Turn notebooks into interactive dashboards or reports. Add filters, dropdowns, and sliders for your data storytelling. 

**Open Source Accessibility**

One of the standout features? It's now open-source! This isn't just a toolkit for developers. It's a bridge that invites interaction, learning, and growth within data science teams everywhere. Check out their GitHub and consider contributing!

**Key Features:**

- **SQL and Python Support:** Instantly convert SQL query results into Python dataframes. The built-in AI assistant aids in writing and debugging code.
- **Real-Time Collaboration:** See edits happening live, engage in discussions directly in the document, and control access with granular permissions.
- **Dashboards without the Hassle:** Say goodbye to stale screenshots! With Briefer, create and share real-time dashboards that evolve alongside your data.

**Use Cases:**
Briefer is utilized by thousands of engineers and data scientists, powering teams at various companies, including Incognia, Whop, and Wander. Whether it's model prototyping, churn prediction, or revenue attribution, Briefer provides the tools to turn data into actionable insights.

**Conclusion**

If you’re looking to elevate your data projects, Briefer might just be your new best friend. It’s the kind of platform that doesn’t just make data accessible—it makes it collaborative, interactive, and impactful. Ready to dive in? Visit [Briefer’s website](https://briefer.cloud) and start transforming the way you work with data today!
